scripts.start-fresh: rm server/db.sqlite && cross-env DEBUG='goodcar-rent-server:*' START_FRESH='yes' npx babel-node ./server/server.js
scripts.start-knex: cross-env DEBUG='goodcar-rent-server:*' APP_STORAGE='knex-sqlite' npx babel-node server/server.js
scripts.start-fresh-knex: rm server/db.sqlite && cross-env DEBUG='goodcar-rent-server:*' START_FRESH='yes' APP_STORAGE='knex-sqlite' npx babel-node ./server/server.js
scripts.start-knex-MySQL: cross-env DEBUG='goodcar-rent-server:*' APP_STORAGE='knex-mysql' npx babel-node server/server.js
scripts.start-fresh-knex-MySQL: cross-env DEBUG='goodcar-rent-server:*' START_FRESH='yes' APP_STORAGE='knex-mysql' npx babel-node server/server.js
